title: Note - 3
clause_text: Note - 3. In case semi-detached construction as per these regulations, common wall constructed is allowed and marginal distance shall be provided for other side as per these regulations.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Note - 3. In case semi-detached construction as per these regulations, common wall constructed is allowed and marginal distance shall be provided for other side as per these regulations.
